page.title: 07A year at Maple Cross J.M.I.
page.content: September 4th is the start of our new term.We all move up a class and wait to find out what our new teachers are like. On September 10th we had our Harvest festival. Occasionally we have mini markets with stalls with sweets,cakes, and jumble. The school organizes several clubs including bookclub,clay club, and gym club.There is also a football and netball team which play against other schools.The football team{won the {league,}and the school recieved a shield which they keep for a year. On November 5th we had a bonfire party.You could get a hot dog or a beefburger and a drink. On December 4th,5th&6th we performed Oliver Twist.It went very well.
